description: ORDER: The reference to the Magistrate Judge is withdrawn as to the Parties' 84, 91 motions for summary judgment. Plaintiff's Motion for Partial Summary Judgment 84 is granted in part and denied in part. Defendants' Cross-Motion for Summary Judgment 91 is granted in part and denied in part. Because this Order does not resolve all of the issues in this FOIA action, the parties shall: (a) confer and attempt to resolve the outstanding issues in this case in light of the Court's rulings; (b) if the Parties cannot resolve all issues, the Parties shall determine what issues remain outstanding; (c) on or before December 15, 2014, the Parties shall file a joint status report. Signed by Judge Douglas L Rayes on 11/14/2014. (See Order for details)(ALS) (Entered: 11/14/2014)
